title: Amber Heard looks ready for business in a black suit as she lands in New York
text:
Amber Heard turned the concourse at JFK in New York into her own personal runway as she sashayed along in a black double breasted jacket with gold buttons, matching pants and a white T-shirt on Wednesday.

She completed her classic, monochrome ensemble with a pair of black and white, patent leather, Stalwart Brogues boots by Chanel.

The Aquaman star seemed to be in a quiet mood as she kept her earbuds in and sunglasses on.

Classic chic: Amber Heard couldn't have looked more stylish when she jetted into New York's JFK on Wednesday

The 33-year-old Aquaman star accessorized with a padded, black leather Saint Laurent purse, two gold brooches on her lapel, trendy hoop earrings, necklaces, bracelets and several rings.

Amber styled her blonde hair into a messy updo and she covered her eyes with large sunglasses.

She enjoyed some time at Paris Fashion Week last month, walking in the Le Defile L'Oreal Paris show.

And she looked like she didn't have a care in the world when she was spotted at JFK, but the actress is embroiled in a defamation lawsuit with her ex-husband, Johnny Depp, 56.

Stepping out: The actress, 33, rocked a black double breasted jacket, matching pants and a white T-shirt plus a pair of black and white Stalwart Brogues boots by Chanel

The duo were married for two years from 2015 to 2017, but Amber filed for divorce in May of 2016.

Once the divorce was final, she wrote an op-ed piece in The Washington Post that seemed to imply that Johnny had been violent with her, although she didn't name him, which is what brought on the defamation suit.

Her lawyers are asking the judge to keep the case under seal because, she says, she doesn't want private details of their friends and families' lives to become public.

Aside from this, Amber is involved in an initiative focused on improving the health and quality of life for Syrian refugee women in Lebanon, through the organization SAMS, or Syrian American Medical Society.

Buttoned up: Amber may have got her inspiration for her monochrome look from this outfit she wore at the Le Defile L'Oreal Paris Show as part of Paris Fashion Week on September 28

In good company: Amber, center, joined Camila Cabello, Helen Mirren, Doutzen Kroes and Lya Kebede who also walked at the show

Meanwhile, her acting career goes from strength to strength.

Amber is currently filming TV miniseries The Stand, based on the Stephen King post-apocalyptic epic, due out next year.

She will play Nadine Cross, opposite Alexander Skarsgard and Whoopi Goldberg, among others.

Her romantic thriller Run Away With Me, also due out next year is in pre-production and Aquaman 2 has been announced for 2022.

Better times: The actress is embroiled in a defamation lawsuit with her ex-husband, Johnny Depp, 56, here seen at the Grammy Awards in Los Angeles in February 2016
description: The 33-year-old Aquaman star looked elegant in a black and white ensemble when she was spotted walking across the concourse in dark glasses at New York's JFK airport on Wednesday .
